description: Finally, a high-performance desktop microphone at a price you can afford with a unique appearance and feel. Free yourself from cumbersome drivers and software with this revolutionary plug & play device.  The Amigo Cobra is setting new standards for voice-capture technology.  What’s more, it is available in 4 colors.
title: Buddy Microphones Amigo Cobra USB Desktop Microphone with FilteredAudio Technology, Red (ISA12010)
